title.rendered: International Conference on Big Data and Artificial Intelligence and IoT (ICBDAIT) at Hyderabad, India [April 15; Get Published]: Submit by March 30!

content.rendered:
Online submissions are invited for the International Conference on Big Data and Artificial Intelligence and IoT (ICBDAIT) at Hyderabad, India. The last date for submission is March 30, 2025.

About The Conference

ARSSS – ICBDAIT International Conference on Big Data and Artificial Intelligence and IoT(ICBDAIT) is a prestigious event organized with a motivation to provide an excellent international platform for the academicians, researchers, engineers, industrial participants and budding students around the world to SHARE their research findings with the global experts. ICBDAIT 2025 will be held in  Hyderabad,India on 15th Apr 2025.

This Conference is organized by The ARSSS (Advanced Research Society for Science and Sociology). The conference would offer a large number of invited lectures from renowned speakers all over the country. The Best paper awards will be given for the papers judged to make the most significant contribution to the conference.

Earlier ARSSS had conferences held at London (UK), Singapore, Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Jakarta, Bali, Batam, Bangkok, Paris, Istanbul, Melbourne (Australia), Pattaya, Phuket, Manila, Hong kong, Johannesburg (South Africa), Phnom Penh (Cambodia), Abu Dhabi and Dubai.

Important Conference Dates

Publication Opportunities 

  • Publication in Journals: This conference is Associated with Google Scholar, Scopus, Web of Science, ABDC and UGC Care listed Peer reviewed international journals.
  • Publication in Conference Proceedings: All registered conference papers will be published Conference proceeding (Having ISBN Number) and the extended versions of the papers will be published in related reputed Scopus/ SCI/WoS/UGC Care Listed international journals.
  • All registered conference papers will be blind peer reviewed by three ARSSS conference committee reviewers. The post conference proceedings will be submitted for indexing in the International Science Index and Thomson Reuters, CiteSeerX, Google Books and Google Scholar, EBSCO, SCOPUS, ERA and ProQuest.
  • The conference proceedings book and certificate of presentation will be distributed to the conference participants at the conference registration desk.

Conference Registration

Registration Fee includes the following:

  • Welcome reception
  • Conference ID Card
  • Conference Folder or Bag
  • Participation in the paper presentation
  • Printed Presentation Certificate
  • Printed Proceedings having ISBN
  • Tea/Coffee breaks on the presentation day
  • Lunch on the presentation day

Post Registration Steps

Once your paper is accepted the registration process begins. You must complete the following four steps:

Step 1 – Choose the Registration Fee according to your categories

It is mandatory for at least one author of an accepted paper to register in order for the paper to be included in the technical program and published in the proceedings. If an author has more than one accepted papers, there will be discount on registration fees of additional papers.

Please see the Fee Structure mentioned below or in the “acceptance letter” your have received
The regular fee will be charged upto 6 pages and after that additional USD 20/INR.500 per additional page will be charged.


Step 2 – Copyright Transfer
Authors have to fill up and sign registration form (for the individual paper), and email that to us in  PDF/JPG/PNG format. 

Step 3 – Camera Ready Paper submission
All papers must adhere to IEEE double-column guidelines and must be submitted in .doc or .docx format only. If the author is unable to format their papers as per ARSSS guidelines, then the formatting facility will be provided by us without any extra charges.

Step 4 – Registration
Email the filled registration form (.doc/.docx format) + final paper/poster/abstract (.doc/.docx format) that you would like to publish in the conference proceedings to email id:  info.arsss@gmail.com only before the last date of registration.

How to Register ?

Interested participants can register through this link.

Deadline

The deadline for submission is March 30.

Click here to view the official Notification of the International Conference on Big Data and Artificial Intelligence and IoT (ICBDAIT) at Hyderabad, India.
